Package fs.polyglot.view

Class Summary
GroupEditor An editor for a group change.
GroupTreeCellRenderer Implements a renderer for a polyglot group tree.
GroupTreeView This implements a tree view of the group structure of a polyglot string table.
LanguageEditor Implements a dialog for editing a Language object.
LanguageListCellRenderer This implements a renderer for cells of language lists.
LanguageListView This class implements a panel containing a list of PolyglotStringTable languages as rendered by LanguageListCellRenderer, together with some buttons to manipulate it
PolyglotConfigurator Implements a dialog for configurating Polyglot.
PolyglotFrame This is the main window of Polyglot.
PolyglotProgressBarManager This class manages a mapping of PolyglotStringTables to ProgressBars, so that there is a unique Progress Bar associated to each table.
RendererLabel Constructs a label which can be used by CellRenderer classes.
StringEditor This class represents the most important tool for editing strings in a PolyglotStringTable.
StringEditorConfiguration This class represents a configuration for the string editor, i.e.: Which strings are selected for editing?
StringEditorConfigurator This class represents a simple dialog used for configuring the list of edited strings of a StringEditor.
StringTreeView This implements the main tree view for the application POLYGLOT.
TableEditPane Implements a three-view panel for editing polyglot string tables.
